心的状態: (しんてきじょうたい) - (yoji) one's mental state
心的表示: (しんてきひょうじ) - mental representation
心破裂: (しんはれつ) - {med} myocardial rupture; cardiac rupture; heart rupture; cardiorrhexis
心神喪失: (しんしんそうしつ) - (yoji) of unsound mind
心神耗弱: (しんしんこうじゃく) - diminished capacity; diminished responsibility; legally unaccountable (e.g. due to mental illness, drugs, alcohol, etc.)
心神耗弱者: (しんしんこうじゃくしゃ) - person of diminished capacity (e.g. drugs, alcohol, mental retardation, etc.)
心移り: (こころうつり) - change of heart; fickleness
心積もり: (こころづもり) - anticipation; expectation; plan; preparation
心積り: (こころづもり) - anticipation; expectation; plan; preparation
心細い: (こころぼそい) - helpless; forlorn; hopeless; unpromising; lonely; discouraging; disheartening
心置きなく: (こころおきなく) - freely; frankly; without reserve
心置き無く: (こころおきなく) - freely; frankly; without reserve
心耳: (しんに) - listening attentively; (しんじ only) auricle (of the atrium)
心肺停止状態: (しんぱいていしじょうたい) - (in a) state of cardiopulmonary arrest
心肺蘇生法: (しんぱいそせいほう) - cardiopulmonary resuscitation; CPR
心胆を寒からしめる: (しんたんをさむからしめる) - to make a person's blood run cold
心腹: (しんぷく) - chest and stomach; one's innermost being
心膜腔: (しんまくこう) - {med} pericardial cavity; pericardial space; cavitas pericardiaca
心臓: (shinzou) - coração; coragem, nervos, ousadia, atrevimento, coragem, espinha dorsal; parte central
心臓がとまる: (しんぞうがとまる) - to have one's heart stop beating; to be shocked/to be staggered
心臓が止まる: (しんぞうがとまる) - to have one's heart stop beating; to be shocked/to be staggered
心臓にけがはえた: (しんぞうにけがはえた) - brazen-faced; completely impudent
心臓にけがはえている: (しんぞうにけがはえている) - brazen-faced; completely impudent
心臓にわるい: (しんぞうにわるい) - causing concern; bad for the heart
心臓に悪い: (しんぞうにわるい) - causing concern; bad for the heart
心臓に毛が生えた: (しんぞうにけがはえた) - brazen-faced; completely impudent
心臓に毛が生えている: (しんぞうにけがはえている) - brazen-faced; completely impudent
心臓まひ: (しんぞうまひ) - cardioplegia; heart attack
心臓マッサージ: (しんぞうマッサージ) - cardiac massage; heart massage
心臓専門医: (しんぞうせんもんい) - cardiologist; heart specialist
心臓弁: (しんぞうべん) - heart valve; cardiac valve
心臓弁膜症: (しんぞうべんまくしょう) - valvular disease of the heart
心臓病: (しんぞうびょう) - heart trouble; heart disease
心臓発作: (しんぞうほっさ) - heart attack; to have a heart attack
心臓破り: (しんぞうやぶり) - (often 心臓破りの丘; 坂) heart-breaking (esp. in physical activity such as running)
心臓破裂: (しんぞうはれつ) - {med} myocardial rupture; cardiac rupture; heart rupture; cardiorrhexis; cardioclasis
心臓神経症: (しんぞうしんけいしょう) - cardiac neurosis
心臓移植: (しんぞういしょく) - heart transplant
心臓移植手術: (しんぞういしょくしゅじゅつ) - heart transplant operation
心臓肥大: (しんぞうひだい) - enlargement of the heart
心臓麻痺: (しんぞうまひ) - cardioplegia; heart attack
心苦しい: (こころぐるしい) - painful; being sorry; feeling sorry
心血を注ぐ: (しんけつをそそぐ) - to put one's heart into; to completely devote oneself to
心血管疾患: (しんけっかんしっかん) - cardiovascular disease
心血管系: (しんけっかんけい) - cardiovascular system
心行く: (こころゆく) - to be completely satisfied or contented
心行くまで: (こころゆくまで) - to one's heart's content
心行く迄: (こころゆくまで) - to one's heart's content
心覚えに: (こころおぼえに) - as a reminder
心許ない: (こころもとない) - uneasy/unsure/anxious; unreliable/untrustworthy/erratic/undependable; nervous/impatient/irritated from anxiety; unclear/indistinct/vague
心許り: (こころばかり) - token; a trifle
心象風景: (しんしょうふうけい) - (yoji) imagined landscape; scenery in one's mind's eye
心身一如: (しんじんいちにょ) - (yoji) body and mind as one; mind-body unity
心身二元論: (しんしんにげんろん) - mind-body dualism
心身創痍: (しんしんそうい) - (yoji) being wounded in mind and body
心身爽快: (しんしんそうかい) - (yoji) feeling refreshed in mind and body
心身障害: (しんしんしょうがい) - mental and physical disorder
心身障害児: (しんしんしょうがいじ) - disabled child; physically handicapped child
心身障害者: (しんしんしょうがいしゃ) - disabled person; physically handicapped person
心遣い: (こころづかい) - solicitude; sympathy; anxiety; regard for; consideration (for others); watchfulness; care
心遺い: (こころづかい) - solicitude; sympathy; anxiety; regard for; consideration (for others); watchfulness; care
心配: (shinpai) - preocupação, apreensão, ansiedade, desconforto, medo; cuidado, ajuda, auxílio, assistência
心配いらない: (しんぱいいらない) - don't worry; there's no need to worry
心配ご無用: (しんぱいごむよう) - Don't worry about it; There is nothing to fear; There is no need for anxiety; Everything is under control
